state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your first objective is to try to take a trip north. Next, try to move west. Then, try to go to the north. And then, take a trip west. With that done, try to head north. After that, make an attempt to travel west. And then, go south. Then, move east. That done, go to the south. With that done, move south. After that, move west. With that accomplished, attempt to go north. Then, try to head north. Then, head west.
